problem: 如图,在▱ABCD中,对角线AC和BD交于点O,AC=24cm,BD=38cm,AD=28cm,则△BOC的周长是()
answer: 解:∵在▱ABCD中,对角线AC和BD交于点O,AC=24cm,BD=38cm,AD=28cm,∴AO=CO=12cm,BO=19cm,AD=BC=28cm,∴△BOC的周长是:BO+CO+BC=12+19+28=59(cm)．故选:B．
comment: 此题主要考查了平行四边形的性质,得出CO,BO的长是解题关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, the diagonal AC and BD intersect at point O, AC = N_0, BD = N_1, AD = N_2, then the perimeter of △BOC is ()
